name: Vegan Coffee Cake
description: The best Vegan Coffee Cake ever, and itâ€™s SO easy to make! Perfect for holiday celebrations or weekend breakfasts.
recipeIngredient: 1/2 cup canola oil (OR melted coconut or avocado oil)

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat the oven to 350 degrees F and lightly grease a 9 x 13 inch cake pan.
recipeInstructions.name: Preheat the oven to 350 degrees F and lightly grease a 9 x 13 inch cake pan.

recipeInstructions.text: Combine the non-dairy milk and apple cider vinegar. Stir a little, then set aside.
recipeInstructions.name: Combine the non-dairy milk and apple cider vinegar. Stir a little, then set aside.

recipeInstructions.text: In a large mixing bowl, stir the flour, baking powder, salt and sugar with a large spoon until well combined.
recipeInstructions.name: In a large mixing bowl, stir the flour, baking powder, salt and sugar with a large spoon until well combined.

recipeInstructions.text: To the bowl with the dry ingredients, pour in the milk/vinegar mixture, oil, applesauce and vanilla. Stir until combined. Pour half of the batter into the prepared cake pan.
recipeInstructions.name: To the bowl with the dry ingredients, pour in the milk/vinegar mixture, oil, applesauce and vanilla. Stir until combined. Pour half of the batter into the prepared cake pan.

recipeInstructions.text: Make the Cinnamon Streusel: In a small bowl, mix the brown sugar and cinnamon together.
recipeInstructions.name: Make the Cinnamon Streusel: In a small bowl, mix the brown sugar and cinnamon together.

recipeInstructions.text: Sprinkle half of the cinnamon streusel over the batter in the pan, then pour the rest of the cake batter on top. Sprinkle with the rest of the streusel.
recipeInstructions.name: Sprinkle half of the cinnamon streusel over the batter in the pan, then pour the rest of the cake batter on top. Sprinkle with the rest of the streusel.

recipeInstructions.text: Bake for 40-45 minutes, or until a toothpick inserted in the middle comes out clean. The vegan butter may still look wet in places, but it will harden as it cools and add a nice crunch to the cake.
recipeInstructions.name: Bake for 40-45 minutes, or until a toothpick inserted in the middle comes out clean. The vegan butter may still look wet in places, but it will harden as it cools and add a nice crunch to the cake.

recipeInstructions.text: Serve with a cup of coffee, if desired and enjoy!
recipeInstructions.name: Serve with a cup of coffee, if desired and enjoy!
